short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple slideshow for displaying your offline images in sequential or random order

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shows a slideshow from your media galleries. Very simple interface, and runs offline. Good for displaying image files from folders on your local USB or disk for chromebook. Best image gallery!

Update 2014-12-05 0.0.3
- use left/right arrows to go back/forward
- show filename
